title: Full Stack Developer
zahteve:
Minimum qualifications:
- At least 2 years of experience in Java (Java SE, Java EE)
- Good Knowledge of JavaScript
- Knowledge of SQL (PostgreSQL) and JPA / Hibernate
- Basic knowledge of Maven, Jenkins, Git
- Basic knowledge of RESTful APIs
- Experience with Linux

Preferred qualifications:
- Experience with NodeJS is plus
- Experience with AngularJS is plus
- Experience with Angular/React is plus
- Good to know: Microservices, Docker, embedded systems
kontakt:
If you are interested in cooperating with us, send us your CV to the e-mail address: jobs@lit-transit.com or apply via our website. We are also open to cooperation in other areas.

You can read more about us on our websites: https://lit-transit.com/ and https://www.papercast.com/
opisDelovnegaMesta: Are you interested in joining a company, which helps perform over 7 billion public transport trips per year?  We are looking for great people, who will be involved in the development of our core public transport platforms and applications. Full Stack development role will be focused on development and feature expansion of our Content Management Platform for public transport. Content Management System controls multiple IoT devices and works as a centralized point for content management delivery to end IoT devices for better passenger experience in public transport.
yeaProgrammingLanguages:
Java
napredno znanje

začetnik
Javascript
predhodno znanje ni potrebno

zahteve:
- Izkušnje z framework-om Angular/Node.js  (sprejemamo tudi prijave z znanjem React).
- Odlično znanje Javascript programskega jezika.

- Natančnost in doslednost

Zaželene izkušnje:
- Poznavanje PHP frameworka (Zend, Laravel, Symfony, CodeIgniter)
- HTML in CSS

kontakt:
AGILEDROP d.o.o.

1000 Ljubljana

opisDelovnegaMesta: Naša hitro rastoča ekipa išče nove moči! Agiledrop v svoje vrste vabi nove PHP razvijalce in razvijalke, ki bi se pridružili dobro utečeni ekipi. Na globalnem trgu ustvarjamo uspešne zgodbe in soustvarjamo digitalno prihodnost. Pridruži se nam! Tvoje naloge bodo vključevale izdelavo modulov in razširitev obstoječih funkcionalnosti Drupala ter drugih (odprtokodnih) tehnologij.  Ponujamo ti redno zaposlitev za nedoločen čas, fleksibilen urnik in hibridno obliko dela: delaš lahko v pisarni, ki ti je najbližje (LJ, MB, CE, NM), ali od doma. Vestno skrbimo za ravnovesje med delom in prostim časom, delovno okolje = mirno + nestresno, plačane nadure so velika izjema in ne pravilo. Izobraževanja in napredovanja: absolutno! S sodelavci in šefi se zabavaš na neobveznih druženjih, novo znanje pridobivaš na internih izobraževanjih.  Več informacij in prijava

title: 13|37 Full Stack JavaScript Inženir_ka
zahteve:
Osebe, ki so uspešne v tej vlogi imajo po navadi:
- Vsaj 2 leti ali več relevantnih izkušenj
- Odlične pisne in govorne komunikacijske sposobnosti v angleščini
- Veselje pri delu s tehnologijami, deljenju znanja in opolnomočenju drugih
- Predanost varnosti in izjemni kvaliteti, ki se izrazi v zanesljivi in varni programski opremi
- Izvrstno razumevanje Javascript-a, različnih okolij izvajanja (Brskalnik, Node.js) in asinhronega programiranja
- Izkušnje z vsaj enim večjim frontend ogrodjem (React, Vue, ali Angular)
- Dobro poznavanje objektnega ali pa še bolje funkcijskega programiranja
- Izkušnje z različnimi state management orodji in praksami
- Izkušnje z event-driven arhitekturo
- izkušnje in razumevanje relacijskih NoSQL bazami podatkov
- Izkušnje z REST in GraphQL APIs
- $ git commit 
- Poznavanje različnih orodij za avtomatizacijo, gradnjo in performance
- Izkušnje s kontejnerizacijo in zelo dobre razvojne navade

Posebno navdušeni bomo še nad:
- Tvojo zavezo k vračanju skupnosti razvidna iz odprtokodnih doprinosov oziroma drugih vidnih iniciativ
- Izkušnjami z native ali razvojem za več platform (Flutter, React Native)
- Izkušnjami s Firebase ali drugimi serverless in oblačnimi storitvami
kontakt: Prijaviš se lahko na povezavi  https://1337co.de/slotech_full_stack
opisDelovnegaMesta: V mednarodnem tehnološkem podjetju tretton37 -> 13|37 iščemo nadarjene in motivirane sodelavke ter sodelavce, da se pridružijo naši skrbno izbrani ekipi v središču Ljubljane.  Odprtih imamo nekaj priložnosti za top-performing osebe iz različnih tehničnih področij pri razvoju programske opreme po meri. V tem trenutku iščemo predvsem izkušenejše sodelavce, smo pa za pravo osebo z dobrim mindsetom pripravljeni narediti tudi izjemo. Ponujamo okolje z izjemnimi posamezniki in posameznicami v cross-functional timih, ki se soočajo z raznolikimi tehnološkimi problemi v večjih mednarodnih podjetjih in zrelih startupih, ki so izzivalni v vseh osebnostnih in tehničnih pogledih. Bolj kot leta izkušenj so nam sicer pomembni odprtost, radovednost, izjemen odnos in motivacija spreminjati naše okolje in življenja naročnikov, uporabnikov naših aplikacij in programske opreme ter sodelavcev na bolje.   Delal_a boš v agilnem okolju, s poudarkom na razvoju visoko performančnih vmesnikov z odlično uporabniško izkušnjo na različnih platformah. Tvoje razvojno delo bo neposredno opolnomočilo organizacije z internimi orodji in pomagalo njihovim produktom odgovoriti na uporabniške potrebe:  - Ideiral_a in razvijal_a boš rešitve za raznolike tehnične probleme v raznovrstnih timih - Aktivno boš sodeloval_a pri sistemski arhitekturi in produktnih odločitvah - Gradil_a boš mikroservise z uporabo serverless in oblačnih tehnologij - Načrtoval_a in implementiral_a boš moderne in visoko dostopne kontejnerizirane backend aplikacije - Gradil_a boš impresivne uporabniške vmesnike in frontende, ki izboljšajo kvaliteto življenja svojih uporabnikov in njihove naravne zmožnosti - Proaktivno boš pomagal_a svojim sodelavcem pri njihovem delu, in jim pomagal_a rasti s pomočjo metod kot so: code reviews, pair programming in druge extreme programming prakse - Nenehno boš iskal_a priložnosti za izboljšanje v odnosu do ljudi, procesov in orodij - Sodeloval_a boš v diskusijah, pri organizaciji delavnic, in aktivno skrbel_a za deljenje svojega znanja - Delal_a boš v distribuiranem timu s sodelavci iz pisarne in remote
yeaProgrammingLanguages:
Javascript

- Razumevanje in izkušnje z objektno usmerjenim programiranjem in izkušnje z vsaj enim izmed OOP jezikov (Java, C#, Python)
- Izkušnje in osnovno razumevanje jezikov XML, SQL in JSON
- Izkušnje z avtomatskim testiranjem, unit testi, funkcionalni testi (JUnit, JSUnit …)

Prednost bodo imeli kandidati, ki imajo:
- Izkušnje s sistemi za nadzor izvorne kode (GIT, git flow)
- Izkušnje na področju SOAP in REST API tehnologij
- Razvojne izkušnje na CRM ali ERP platformi

Ključne so tudi naslednje lastnosti:
- Radovednost, energija in pozitivno naravnanost
- Sposobnost (so)delovanja v timu
- Aktivno znanje angleškega jezika
kontakt: Če se prepoznate v opisu in menite, da vas moramo spoznati, oddajte svojo prijavo preko obrazca na https://www.agilcon.com/sl/zaposlitev/back-end-salesforce/ ali nas kontaktirajte na novi.izzivi@agilcon.si

Vaša odgovornost bo razvoj zaledja Salesforce aplikacij, testiranje in predaja v uporabo visoko prilagodljivih rešitev CRM in HRM funkcionalnosti, ki bodo uporabnikom olajšale delovne procese. title: Senior Java Engineer
zahteve:
Professional Requirements:
- More than 5 years of experience as a Java developer
- Excellent understanding of computer science fundamentals: algorithms, data structures, design patterns.
- Good understanding of Java concurrency and multithreading, functional and reactive programming, performance analysis, security.
- Experience with software engineering best practices (TDD, CI, SOLID, etc.).
- Experience building large-scale and fault-tolerant distributed systems is a plus.
- Experience with AWS cloud services is a plus (Document DB, Dynamo DB, Aurora, Elasticache, Elasticsearch, MSK)
- Experience with automated deployments and containerized application management (k8s)
- Degree in computer science or software engineering (or equivalent work experience).
- Team character and communication skills.

Personality requirements:
- Willingness to learn new technologies.
- Creative thinker, keen to further refine the system and process.
- Committed to upholding the highest professional work standards and ethics.
- Positive, can-do attitude.
- Fluent in English (written and spoken).
kontakt:
Apply directly via: https://sportradar.wd3.myworkdayjobs.com/en-US/sportradar_careers/job/Ljubljana/Senior-Java-Engineer_JREQ2472
or send an email to tina.strus@sportradar.com
opisDelovnegaMesta: Make the team that changes the way the world experiences sport.  We are looking for a dedicated Senior Java Engineer interested in sports and betting for the expansion of our Managed Trading Services in Ljubljana/Slovenia.  THE CHALLENGE: - Build and improve backend micro-services of a larger distributed system.  - Improve the reliability and performance of our backend stack and help with migration to cloud-native architecture. - Lead your services through complete delivery pipeline, from design, development all the way to deployment and monitoring it in production. - Definition of backend team member goals and objectives, planning and monitoring team member’s personal growth, mentoring.  Sportradar is the leading global provider of sports betting and sports entertainment products and services. Since 2001, Sportradar has occupied a unique position at the intersection of the sports, media and betting industries; providing sports federations, news media, consumer platforms and sports betting operators with a range of solutions to help grow their business.  Managed Trading Services (MTS) is a holistic solution that enables bookmakers to future-proof their business. The MTS team comprise the company’s Trading Unit as part of a 100+ strong team of industry-experienced personnel, supported by Betradar’s own trading and risk technology. They are responsible for providing bookmaker and platform provider clients of all sizes across the world with all the tools required to differentiate from the competition, improve efficiency and increase profit margins, whilst future proofing their business and securing it from risk. The MTS team offers a suite of fully flexible turnkey solutions from providing fixtures to compiling odds, monitoring liabilities, through to resulting and settlement.  MTS Key Facts, 170 bookmakers active on MTS, Multiple brands in excess of 300, 40+ geographical markets, 3.5+ million active unique players per month.   To find out more about our Managed Trading Services, please visit https://www.betradar.com/managed-tradin...

title: Frontend Engineer - Data Visualisation
zahteve:
Professional Requirements:
- More than 2 years of experience as a Frontend or Web Developer. 
- Proficient knowledge of HTML/CSS. 
- Good understanding of JavaScript language and web development principles.
- Experience with at least one client-side JavaScript library or framework, ideally ReactJS.
- Understanding of version control, branching, and merging.
- Any experience with web design and web design software is a plus.
- Fluent in English.
- Ability to work in a dynamic international environment.
- A very keen eye for the details.
- Proactivity and willingness to learn new technologies.

Personality requirements:
- Team character and communication skills.
- Willingness to learn new technologies and a positive, can-do attitude.
- A creative thinker, keen to further refine the system and process.
- Committment to upholding the highest professional work standards and ethics.
- Excellent knowledge of English (written and spoken)
kontakt:
Apply directly via: https://sportradar.wd3.myworkdayjobs.com/en-US/sportradar_careers/job/Ljubljana/Front-end-Engineer_JREQ2191
or send an email to tina.strus@sportradar.com
opisDelovnegaMesta: Make the team that changes the way the world experiences sport.  From Gaelic Hurling to Finnish Bandliiga. From the Guatemalan Liga Nacional to ESports Counterstrike coverage of the ESEA Premier Division. Whatever your sport, you’ve felt the sting of the losses and the exhilarating glory of the wins. Sports provide people with a common connection and the potential to share special moments with complete strangers. And ever since odds were laid on chariot racing in Ancient Rome, fans of sport need complete information and they need it quickly.   Sportradar provides the source code for sport. Over 1,000 companies worldwide rely on Sportradar’s data depth and quality. With over 300M odds changes published every month and 30TB of metrics observed we rely on our squads to deliver this data reliably and accurately.  We’re looking to expand our Betting Entertainment Tools team in Ljubljana with a Frontend Engineer. You’ll be joining a dedicated and closely connected team that specializes in market leading betting solutions integrated by more than 400 clients and reaching hundreds of millions of sport fans and punters globally.  As a Front-end Engineer, you’ll work together with a team of experienced designers, product owners, and senior engineers to develop innovative and intuitive products. Ease of customisation, polished design, following the latest industry trends, and abundance of data are key areas that make our solutions stand out from the rest.   THE CHALLENGE: - Design and implement client-side components using Sportradar’s proprietary frontend framework based on ReactJS. - Slicing designs into pixel-perfect HTML/CSS layouts and spice them up with animations. - Implement new functionalities based on specifications and work on stabilisation of existing applications.  About Sportradar: Sportradar is on a journey! We’ve adopted the Spotify model to empower our people; we value local decision making. Tribes have defined tech stacks and ways of working however with continuous improvement in our DNA we’ve created ‘make it better time’ where you get to shape our future stack and ways of working, as well as work on the problems you care about it or improve your own skills.  We are actively adopting test-driven development as it matches our engineering principle ‘if it’s not tested, its broken’. We follow a cloud native strategy; managed services enable us to focus on the problems that interest us most – and we invest in our people with AWS training as we recognize the skills modern developers need to succeed. We’ve a preference for modern lightweight microservices; we leverage the right tools for the job. If this sounds interesting, we should talk.

title: Dobrodošel v naši ekipi spletne rešitve Sloway!
zahteve: Od novega sodelavca pričakujemo, da dobro obvlada spletno programiranje (ali pa to želi doseči). Iščemo nekoga, ki bi prinesel nove ideje v naš team. Iščemo nekoga s katerim bomo šli lahko tudi na kavo in v petek na pivo :)
kontakt:
Še nekaj o nas. Smo ekipa štirih, ki nam je ta trenutek obstoječa količina dela rahlo zrasla čez meje obvladljivega. Radi delamo in vestno skrbimo za vse naše stranke, vendar je prišel čas, ko moramo spustiti v našo ekipo novo (po)moč. S strankami sklepamo dolgoročna partnerstva in sklepamo fair-play dogovore. Skrbno izbiramo stranke, tiste ki so pripravljene konstruktivno sodelovati, se angažirati in postavljati jasne in realne zahteve. Mi pa se potrudimo najbolje razumeti njihove želje in jih osmisliti v učinkovit in uspešen spletni projekt. Ne bojimo se predlagati druge rešitve, če vemo da bo to za stranko dobro. Stremimo k temu, da združujemo vrhunski izgled, dobro uporabniško izkušnjo in usmerjenost v rezultate.

Pišite na: info(afna)sloway.com
opisDelovnegaMesta: Najlepša hvala ker si si vzel-a čas za naš oglas za delo. V naši agenciji za spletne rešitve iščemo novega sodelavca, ki se bo v naši ekipi počutil dobro in bo svoje delo opravljal z veseljem. To pomeni, da bo z radovednostjo sprejemal nove izzive, vestno opravljal zanimive in malo manj zanimive naloge, pomagal drugim in bil pripravljen sprejeti pomoč, jasno predstavil svoja pričakovanja in vestno izpolnil svoje obveznosti. Kot ekipa smo najmočnejši kadar zares in iskreno sodelujemo. Takrat ni noben projekt nedosegljiv. Prosim razmisli in se oglasi na informativni sestanek. Spoznajmo se, morda se ujamemo.

title: DevOps Engineer
zahteve:
1. What do we expect?
- Have at least 2 years of experience with developing/managing infrastructure using modern development processes. 
- Have experience with one of OOP languages such as, PHP, Python, Golang, etc.
- Have understanding and experience with relational databases (e.g., MySQL) or No-SQL databases (e.g., Mongo).
- Experience with debugging and profiling in a production environment.
- Willingness to learn, and help us learn too.
- Be fluent in written and spoken English.

2. We appreciate:
- A big plus is some interest in or have experience with cloud computing (AWS, Google Azure …). 
- Experience with Kubernetes and containerization in production environments. 
- B.Sc. or higher in Computer Science or a related field.
- Be open to collaborating in the tech community.
kontakt: Apply here: https://celtra.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0uasp/
opisDelovnegaMesta: We are looking for an infrastructure engineer (DevOps / SRE) to help us manage, grow and scale our infrastructure for both (CA and CE) products. We are looking for a motivated, constantly-learning engineer who understands how modern cloud native infrastructure works.  1. What would be your responsibilities?  You will be part of our DevOps team, which is responsible for our product’s availability, latency, performance, efficiency, monitoring, emergency response and capacity planning. Your responsibility will be:  - Design, develop and maintain software that handles deploying, scaling and monitoring of our products. Establish design patterns and best practices for building new product features in a scalable and reliable way. - Verify and help developers apply those patterns and participate in early stages of feature design, when needed. - On-call a portion of your time to get your hands dirty and gain experience. - Production environment is something you care about and willing to share with developers to diagnose issues and hunt down elusive bugs. - SLA is your law, uptime objectives are met by participating in controlling the risks and rate of change in collaboration with the QA team.   2. What are the challenges ahead?  We are facing many tech challenges ahead. Our application is a giant beast which is deployed multiple times per week. We are working towards having multiple deploys per day, basically for every code change landing in the master branch.   Besides that we want our developers to be productive and spend more time on features and less on hitting infrastructure caused roadblock. Currently, our DevOps team is responsible for our software that is up and running under provided SLA constraints. As software complexity grows, handling incidents becomes harder because of lack of domain knowledge. We are working towards delegating ownership to individual dev teams who will become responsible and capable of handling incident and customer facing issues in production at any time.  3. What kind of infrastructure stack do we have?  We are full on Kubernetes (k8s) and are running our infrastructure in AWS cloud. Our application is containerized in Docker and deployed on k8s cluster. Our application mainly consist of:  - Hundreds of services scaled automatically, - tens of real-time services handling hundreds of millions requests every minute, - tens of different databases, like MySQL, MongoDB, DynamoDB, PostgresDB, …, - monitoring services, like Prometheus, Grafana, ... - our infrastructure is mostly templatized using Terraform and AWS CloudFormation. Some parts of infrastructure and custom scripts are also written in Python.

title: Full-Stack Software Engineer (various levels) - Distribution Team
zahteve:
1. Expectations
- You care about clean code. You write high-quality, maintainable code and are aware of industry best practices and trends. You proactively identify possible technical issues before they turn into long-term problems, and you encourage others to do the same. We always do code reviews to provide feedback and ensure code quality.
- You have a product mindset. We are not a feature factory. We have cross-functional teams with engineers, product managers, and product designers who are crafting a solution for a problem since day one. There is a lot of fun in this phase, requiring a lot of ingenuity, hacking, and validating.
- You have strong troubleshooting skills. You are not afraid to parse logs, look at machine metrics or go deep into the code to understand what went wrong. You do not jump to conclusions, but act based on facts and evidence.
- You are a team player. You work well in the team, are willing to share the knowledge, and want to help others as you know only a strong team can succeed.

2. Qualifications
- At least 2 years of experience in programming and following modern software development processes.
- Experience with building single-page applications using modern web technologies (Javascript / TypeScript / CSS / HTML) and frameworks (Vue.js / React / Angular / Ember.js).
- Experience with server-side principles (scaling, concurrency, etc. and back-end technologies (PHP, Python, Golang, Ruby, etc.).
- Understanding and experience with relational databases (e.g. MySQL) or document databases (e.g. Mongo).
- Experience with writing unit, integration, and end-to-end tests.
- Willingness to learn, sharing our passion for constant improvement.
- Fluent in written and spoken English.

3. Bonus points
- Experience with TDD & CI.
- Interest in or experience with UX/UI.
- Understanding of various software paradigms and architecture styles (REST, OOP, functional programming, state management, etc.).
- B.Sc. or higher in Computer Science or a related field.
- Being open to collaborating in the tech community.
kontakt: Apply via https://celtra.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0u25e/
opisDelovnegaMesta: 1. What is our team responsible for? The distribution team owns scaling the creative production and distribution of ready creatives to 3rd party platforms. Our work begins once creative templates and content in the form of data feeds are ready. We take care of automagically creating thousands of creatives from a bunch of templates. Once all those creatives are generated and approved, our pipeline composes images and videos at scale as well as perfect HTML that works everywhere. The last step is ensuring seamless distribution of assets through the integrations with the biggest players in the ecosystem (Facebook, Google, Twitter, Snapchat, Pinterest, ...) and our very own publicly available async Creative Export API.  2. Who are we searching for? We are looking for Full Stack engineers to join us on the journey of building a scalable and intuitive Creative Automation product. We appreciate Full Stack engineers from both ends of the spectrum - more backend or frontend oriented ones. There’s a lot of interesting challenges to tackle on both ends! There’s also a lot of opportunities to get your hands dirty with more product-related work if that is what inspires you.  3. In the past we built - An async processing pipeline capable of generating thousands of creatives from scalable templates. - Homegrown solutions for a highly concurrent async processing pipeline with a built-in prioritization and caching system, smart conversion of HTML text elements into images for reducing ad size, conversion of animated HTML into MP4 files using puppeteer and FFmpeg. - Scalable & publically available Export API capable of delivering thousands of finalized creative assets.  4. What are the challenges ahead? - Reimagine the creative data model to increase creative generation speed by 100x, - next-generation of our headless Chromium-based rendering pipeline, - evolution and further adoption of our homegrown async processing pipeline solution, - staying on top of the evolving landscape by adding direct integrations with the newest players like TikTok.  5. What kind of tech stack do we use? Our CA product is using NodeJs, PHP, MySQL, Redis, and Python. We use Vue.js, Vue.js router & Vuex with npm, and Webpack on the frontend for both products. When needed (usually for performance reasons) we also resort to vanilla JavaScript. Everything runs on the AWS cloud, and the Kubernetes cluster orchestrates it.

The E-commerce team has a mission to find, validate and build product solutions for e-comm brands. It is widely known that user tracking is more and more difficult especially with recent policies introduced by Google and Apple. Therefore, we are focusing on building from scratch cookieless remarketing solutions for advertising on social platforms, such as FB, Google, Snapchat, etc. Besides that, we are discovering and validating content scaling challenges and product opportunities for advertising on eCommerce platforms, such as Amazon.  2. In the past we built We built a served remarketing solution which is used today by our top brands such as Adidas and Lululemon. This includes solving challenges such as user tracking, handling user's privacy (GDPR), building pipelines for processing and storing huge amounts of events in real-time, ...  3. What are the challenges ahead? - Automated processing and building of product catalogs with 50k assets every hour in real-time. - Providing seamless UI for importing, building, managing and previewing generated ads from product catalogs in real-time. - Building generic public API for bringing content/assets from external providers, such as Digital Asset Managers, ... - Building HTML ads and generation of product listing pages for the Amazon ecosystem.  4. What kind of tech stack do we use? Our CA product is using NodeJs, PHP, MySQL, Redis and Python. For both products, on the front-end, we use Vue.js, NPM, Webpack and vanilla JavaScript when needed. Everything runs on the AWS cloud, and the Kubernetes cluster orchestrates it.
yeaProgrammingLanguages:
Modern web technologies (Javascript / TypeScript / CSS / HTML) and frameworks (VueJS / React / Angular).

title: Senior Full Stack Software Engineer - Review team
zahteve:
1. Expectations
- You care about clean code. You write high-quality, maintainable code and are aware of industry best practices and trends. You proactively identify possible technical issues before it turns into long-term problems, and you encourage others to do the same. We always do code reviews to provide feedback and ensure code quality.
- You have a product mindset. We are not a feature factory. We have cross-functional teams with engineers, product managers, and product designers who are crafting a solution for a problem since day one. There is a lot of fun in this phase, requiring a lot of ingenuity, hacking, and validating.
- You have strong troubleshooting skills. You are not afraid to parse logs, look at machine metrics or go deep into the code to understand what went wrong. You do not jump to conclusions, but act based on facts and evidence.
- You are a team player. You work well in the team, are willing to share the knowledge, and want to help others as you know only a strong team can succeed.

2. What would be your responsibilities?
- Create performant interfaces that are a joy to use
- Contribute to the technical direction of our modules, define them and execute on them
- Help define and improve the architecture
- Code, review other people's code, ensure code quality, be a good boy scout, etc.
- Work with the Products, Customer support, and other internal teams to solve challenges
- Teach and help junior/mid-level developers grow
- Help plan and transfer old parts of the codebase to the state of the art

3. Qualifications:
- 3+ years of experience in programming and following modern software development processes.
- Have experience of building single-page applications using modern web technologies (Javascript / TypeScript / CSS / HTML) and frameworks (VueJS / React / Angular).
- Have experience with server-side principles (scaling, concurrency, etc. and back-end technologies (PHP, Python, Golang, Ruby, etc.).
- Have understanding and experience of relational databases (e.g., MySQL) or document databases (e.g., Mongo).
- Have experience with writing a unit, integration, and end-to-end tests.
- Willingness to learn, sharing our passion for constant improvement
- Experience with complex business software and large codebases
- Experience with developing and deploying performant frontend code
- Show passion for learning, and help us learn too.
- Be fluent in written and spoken English.

4. We appreciate:
- Experience with TDD & CI
- A big plus is some interest in or experience with UX/UI
- Understanding of various software paradigms and architecture styles (REST, OOP, functional programming, state management, etc.)
- B.Sc. or higher in Computer Science or a related field
- Be open to collaborating in the tech community
kontakt: Apply via https://celtra.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0u2dt/

Our team is making collaboration at scale possible with our purpose built preview tool facilitating overview of thousands of ads side-by-side, search capabilities, real-time commenting, annotations, and by tapping into existing communication channels such as Slack.  2. Who are we searching for? We are looking for senior Fullstack software engineers with an appreciation for Frontend technologies to join the journey of building the Creative Automation team (CA).  3. In the past we built Real-time collaborative commenting (like Google Docs) A pin dropping to mark specific ad details. High-performance infinite scroll of thousands of ads. Google Doc like sharing capabilities.  4. What are the challenges ahead? - Alternative ad overview layouts (grouping, sampling) - Integrating with existing client workflows - Slack app - Ad approvals - Comments with emojis and reactions - Continues scalability improvements both on backend and frontend - Notifications pipeline revamp  5. What kind of tech stack do we use? Our CA product is using NodeJs, PHP, MySQL, Redis and Python. For both products, on the front-end, we use Vue.js, NPM, Webpack and vanilla JavaScript when needed. Everything runs on the AWS cloud, and the Kubernetes cluster orchestrates it.

title: Senior Frontend Engineer
zahteve:
As a senior frontend engineer, your development skills will help us improve everything from our signup process, our onboarding process, and especially our core user-facing product features (data visualizations, interactive dashboard editor...).

 

You will:

work closely with our product managers and engineers to develop product features and user interfaces
translate designs/mockups into fully responsive prototypes
write and maintain clean, reusable and maintainable code
test and identify performance problems
work with our backend team and customer success team to troubleshoot customer support issues
cooperate with other teams to come up with the best technical solutions for new features
work with tools and technologies like EmberJS, LESS, Github, CircleCI and Docker on a regular basis


You should have:

Extended (3+ years) experience with frontend web development
Experience with single-page web apps and Javascript frameworks
Willingness to learn new things and solve problems in a quick-changing and challenging environment, highly motivated, proactive, and pragmatic
Good communication skills
Knowledge of web standards (REST) and web security
Basic knowledge of git and how Github works
kontakt: jobs@databox.com
opisDelovnegaMesta: Databox, a fast-growing software company that helps other companies monitor and improve their business performance, is going to give an opportunity to enthusiastic individuals to help us scale our systems from thousands to millions of users. We are looking for a man or a woman who wants to be a part of a fast-paced-team that is continuously learning and challenging ourselves- building a technically-superior product that is loved by business users. We are always exploring new tools and ideas as our needs evolve, and we love working alongside people who are willing to try new things. Code reviews, writing unit tests, and belief in the value of coding standards are only some of our core engineering values. We recognize achievement, promote from within, and encourage professional growth, collaboration, knowledge sharing, and fun.    Our product team includes experts in design, integrations, frontend, mobile, and backend engineering. Because our application is used to visualize performance data on multiple devices (mobile, web, TV, and more) from 100s of other software systems, UI and UX design is a major focus of ours that has helped us win multiple design awards and constant praise from our users.

title: Ruby/Python senior backend engineer
zahteve: You need to be very comfortable with relational databases, Linux and the command-line. Experience with web scraping at scale, data processing pipelines and software architectures in general is very desirable.
kontakt: jobs@mediately.co
opisDelovnegaMesta: Mediately is growing and we're looking for a Ruby or Python(*) backend engineer!  Our free mobile apps for doctors provide them with all relevant drug information and clinical tools to make their daily job easier. They are used by more than 150.000 doctors in 8 countries and they love us (check our reviews below). It all started with an idea by two doctors 8 years ago, then soon became the go-to app for doctors, which saves them time and improves patient care. We are an enthusiastic and growing team of 25 people from 4 countries, continuing to expand in even more countries and add new features, and we hope you will join us!  This is a senior position, requiring an experienced developer to help us maintain and build upon the backend of our mobile/web apps. We have quite a well developed data-processing pipeline that scrapes many web sources across 8 countries (HTML, but also DOC, PDF, XLS...) and then cleans data, verifies data, raises warnings, merges multiple sources, applies custom fixes and finally builds single-file databases for use in mobile apps. (Before the final build, quality assurance is performed by a separate team.)  You will be joining the backend/ops team of 5 developers (6 more in the mobile/web team) and your main tasks will be:   - maintaining data-processing pipeline and improving its architecture - building scraping and parsing components for new sources - improving data quality assurance processes

Za optimalne delovne pogoje pa poskrbijo popolnoma nova pisarna z razgledom, odlična kava, poln hladilnik, sveže sadje, smutiji in prigrizki ter kotiček za sprostitev.
